title: On My Way Ahead
description: Tom Tyler, young ward to the mostly beloved superhero Morning Light, takes to the streets each night as the crime-fighting Score. Together they help keep the streets of Sail City safe, despite a lingering, more than justified mistrust of vigilantes and superheroes. Tom and best friend Chrissy, better known as the hero Squire, are on the back foot. Never count a good hero out, though - together and with the help of those around them, Tom and Chrissy are ready to fight back and make sure Sail City stays safe. What neither of them counted on? The cost.
author: Jon D. Arthur
